headline: Does D.R. Horton Still Offer Value After Its Strong Multi Year Share Price Rally?
summary: If you are wondering whether D.R. Horton at around $160 a share is still a smart buy or if most of the upside is already priced in, this breakdown is for you. The stock has climbed 2.5% over the last week, 10.4% in the past month, and is up 16.8% year to date. Over longer horizons, it has gained 92.6% over 3 years and 141.4% over 5 years, while the 1-year return is a more modest 1.9%. These moves have unfolded as investors weigh ongoing strength in U.S. housing demand alongside shifting...
